sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography } from '@mui/material'; const Hero = () => ( Welcome to the Employee Management System Streamline your employee management process with ease. Our Employee Management System (EMS) is designed to simplify and automate your HR processes. With our system, you can efficiently manage employee data, track performance, and streamline workflows. Key Features:
  • Centralized employee database
  • Performance tracking and management
  • Automated reporting and analytics
  • Secure access and data management
 ); export default Hero;
